Package org.centrale.objet.WoE

Class Personnage

java.lang.Object
org.centrale.objet.WoE.ElementDeJeu
org.centrale.objet.WoE.Creature
org.centrale.objet.WoE.Personnage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Deplacable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Archer, Guerrier, Paysan
public abstract class Personnage extends Creature
The class Personnage represents a human being in the world Under this Superclass, we can find subclasses such as warrior, archer, etc. This class has features such as the ability to move, attack and use items.

  • Constructor Details

    • Personnage

      public Personnage(String nom, int ptVie, int degAtt, int ptPar, int pageAtt, int pagePar, int distAttMax, Point2D pos)
      Initializes a newly created Personnage object, so that it represents the same values of characters as the argument.
      Parameters:
      nom - name of person
      ptVie - points of life
      degAtt - points of attack
      ptPar - points of defense
      pageAtt - pourcentageAtt
      pagePar - pourcentagePar
      distAttMax - longest distance it can attack
      pos - position, class of class 2D

      Parameters:
      nom - name of person

    • Personnage

      public Personnage(Personnage perso)

      Parameters:
      perso - an instance of person

    • TrouPotion

      public void TrouPotion(PotionSoin p)
      When find a potion type, put into knapsack We will first check if the input parameter is a potion class, if yes, put into knapsack.
      Parameters:
      p - instance of Potion Soin

    • usePotion

      public void usePotion()
      The process of using potion first, we will check whether there is potion in Knapsack, if no, program will print "no potion" if yes, potion will be moved out of knapsack, and set as null to be collect as garbage.

    • useEpinard

      public void useEpinard()
      This function is called when the player uses an Epinard, takes the used Epinard from the backpack and increases the player's corresponding ability.

    • getPotionsoins

      public Vector<PotionSoin> getPotionsoins()
      Get PotionSoin of a class of person.
      Returns:
      a vector of PotionSoin, PotionSoin is a class of potion, potion were stored in it.

    • setPotionsoins

      public void setPotionsoins(Vector<PotionSoin> potionsoins)
      Set a person's knapsack of potion with a knapsack's potion. So we can see it's a vector.
      Parameters:
      potionsoins - a list of PotionSoin(vector)
